intro: Throw a party with Gabby and the Gabby Cats. Explore magical worlds – enjoy fun activities, minigames and rewards playing solo or with a friend.
description:
Inspired by DreamWorks Animation’s Gabby’s Dollhouse, fans can throw the greatest party ever with Gabby and Pandy Paws! 

Start in Crafting World with Mama and Baby Box, then join Kitty Fairy in the magical Fairy Tail Garden. Blast off to Caturn and groove with DJ Catnip. Whip up something tasty with Cakey in Sweet Treat Mountain, dive into Mermaid-lantis for treasure with MerCat, and race through the Playroom with Carlita.  

Enjoy challenges and minigames solo or with a friend in local co-op mode to find items for the party and cute outfits to customize Gabby.  

Learn, play, and create. Everyone’s invited!

GET TINY WITH GABBY & PANDY PAWS: Play solo or with friends in local co-op for pawsome fun. 

EXPLORE THE WAY YOU WANT: Start in the Craft Room, then hop in the catavator and go anywhere in the Dollhouse. 

PARTY WITH THE GABBY CATS: Pandy Paws, Cakey, DJ Catnip, and the rest of the kitten crew are invited.  

GO WHERE YOUR IMAGINATION TAKES YOU: Leap into fun activities and minigames. 

LEARN & GROW WITH GABBY: Get creative, try new hobbies and enjoy easy controls. 

CELEBRATE IN STYLE:  Personalize Gabby’s look with cat-tastic costume for every room.
